name: Comparating
body:
# Comparating

Comparating is a project aimed at testing the practicability of rating things by comparing them by pairs.

It's a well-known idea ([Elo Rating System](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elo_rating_system), [Facemash](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/History_of_Facebook#Facebook.28facemash.29), [Polar](http://www.polarb.com)...) and I would like to try it on different use-cases to see if it is well suited to certain kind of activities.

In particular, I'm often confronted to the situation where a group of people want to agree on a choice.
Be it which ice-cream flavors to buy, which user-stories to be completed in priority, which film to watch, or which restaurant where to eat.

**A tool where you could choose or upload your set of things to rate, have everyone vote, and visualize the results to reach a consensus.**

## [Try the Demo](comparating.meteor.com)
